parameters.name: AuthType
parameters.description:
The authorization type. Valid values:

- NORMAL: A regular authorization.

- CLOUD\_PRODUCT: An authorization for an Alibaba Cloud service.

parameters.name: AuthorizedUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that owns the authorized resources.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. The value starts from 1. The default value is 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. The maximum value is 100. The default value is 20.
